message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I think my product is worth more than that. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000.
I understand that you're willing to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,200. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,800.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a small concession myself and offer $10,500. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Bob. However, I'm still not getting the price I want. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,700.
I understand that you're trying to get the price you want, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $10,400. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Bob. However, I'm still not getting the price I want. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,600.
I understand that you're trying to get the price you want, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $10,300. Can you consider that?
